business.pricing: Rates are quoted after a brief intake call. Austin Antique Appraisals supports antique appraisal needs across Austin, TE.

content.about: Austin Antique Appraisals provides professional antique appraisal services in the Austin area with expertise in antique furniture, collectibles, fine art, and estate items. We offer thorough, accurate valuations for insurance, estate planning, charitable donations, and more.
content.notes: Austin Antique Appraisals serves Austin, TE with antique appraisal support focused on Antique Furniture, Vintage Collectibles, Estate Jewelry.

reviews.author: Susan J.
reviews.content: I needed an appraisal for a charitable donation of my antique collection, and Austin Antique Appraisals delivered excellent service. All tax requirements were met perfectly.

reviews.content: Excellent service from start to finish. I highly recommend Austin Antique Appraisals for any antique appraisal needs.
